TopicTitle: SCANsat Landing Target. How the HELL do I remove it?

Articles.Content:
So once a upon a time I clicked the Landing Target in the small map for SCANsat. Ever since I have been bugged by its ever staying presence on Minmus, with no way of removing it. Please tell me how to freaking remove this thing!

Edited June 12, 2015 by Sokar408

https://imgur.com/a/HvaOe#nE0BlA8

On the third image:

Select the target icon on the zoom map, then click somewhere inside of the zoom window, but outside of the map itself.

https://imgur.com/a/HvaOe#nE0BlA8

On the third image:

Select the target icon on the zoom map, then click somewhere inside of the zoom window, but outside of the map itself.

Love you long time!
